subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Bertuzzi’s 1,000th career game came to a fitting and dramatic conclusion, when he slowed in front of the net and veered right before flipping a backhander over Minnesota goalie Niklas Backstrom.
snippet: Bertuzzi’s 1,000th career game came to a fitting and dramatic conclusion, when he slowed in front of the net and veered right before flipping a backhander over Minnesota goalie Niklas Backstrom.
